metadata: (info { (description "Gopher is a simple game made by Mark Steere to be easy to program.") (rules "The first player begins the game by placing a stone anywhere on the board. Then, starting with the second player, players take turns placing a stone orthogonally adjacent to exactly one enemy stone and no friendly stones.")
